name: The Same World
description:
This is a brain storm!

This is a fantastic game composed by beautiful scene, poignant story and stage of whimsy.

Your wisdom is the only weapon what you can rely on, all black and white circles are unified into the same color by sliding, help the two people to break through the barriers.

As the game progresses, the stage will be more and more difficult, do you have the confidence to break through the wall of black and white?

The Same World based on 1080p, every scene is tailored carefully, in any scene you can get a beautiful screenshot.

.headphones recommend.

-------
